mapper.update: update sc_warehouse_resource_action set w_id = #{wId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, reserved_num = #{reservedNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, reserved_date = #{reservedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_userid = #{auditUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, system_type = #{systemType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pmid = #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, w_id, num, reserved_num, reserved_date, `type`, create_time, audit_userid, system_type, pmid from sc_warehouse_resource_action where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, w_id, num, reserved_num, reserved_date, `type`, create_time, audit_userid, system_type, pmid from sc_warehouse_resource_action
select id, w_id, num, reserved_num, reserved_date, `type`, create_time, audit_userid, system_type, pmid from sc_warehouse_resource_action order by id desc
